thread.title: Banner unveiling planned for Duke preseason event
thread.title_full: Banner unveiling planned for Duke preseason event

author: Times-News
title: Banner unveiling planned for Duke preseason event
text: Posted Oct. 16, 2015 at 4:57 PM Updated at 5:12 PM Posted Oct. 16, 2015 at 4:57 PM Updated at 5:12 PM DURHAM — Duke’s “Countdown to Craziness” preseason men’s basketball event will include the unveiling of the 2015 NCAA championship banner Saturday at Cameron Indoor Stadium. “Countdown to Craziness” includes games, highlight videos and on-court contests leading up to the introduction of the team, the release of this season’s poster and the annual Blue-White Scrimmage. Festivities begin at 4 p.m. in Krzyzewskiville, located adjacent to Cameron Indoor Stadium, where fans can take part in activities, music and games. Doors to the arena open at 5:30 p.m. with the Blue-White Scrimmage set to tip at approximately 8:30 p.m. By Times-News
